org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports

Class PassiveNiFilters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.PassiveNiFilters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NiFilters

    public class PassiveNiFilters
extends java.lang.Object
implements NiFilters
    a passive NiFilters instance. All of its return data is specified at instance construction time, except the workspace filter. The workspace filter is defined as being the result of filtering the ownerIds generated by a given function through a filter given at construction time.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.function.Function<NiReportsEngine,java.util.Set<java.lang.Long>> activityIdsComputer
      the function used to generate the initial activity ids
      protected java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.Long> activityIdsPredicate
      the supplemental Predicate to be applied on the activity ids
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.function.Predicate<Cell>> cellPredicates
      the predicates on cells applied to the cells of given columns
      protected NiReportsEngine engine
      the NiReportsEngine instance used as a context to generate this instance
      protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> filteringColumns
      the columns whose filtered-out ids are to be used to filter out the ids eligible for the report
      protected java.util.Map<NiDimension.NiDimensionUsage,java.util.function.Predicate<NiDimension.Coordinate>> filteringCoordinates
      the predicates on coordinates applied to all the cells of the report which respond to a given coordinate
      protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> mandatoryHiers
      the hierarchies which the generated report MUST have.
      protected Memoizer<java.util.Set<java.lang.Long>> workspaceFilter
      the memoized set of ids of the initial workspace filter

      Constructors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<java.lang.Long> getActivityIds()
      the IDs of the entities (activities / pledges) which are selected by the workspace filter or global filter
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.function.Predicate<Cell>> getCellPredicates()
      returns the predicate-filters to impose on all the raw cells which come out of fetchers on a given column.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.Long> getFilteredActivityIds()
      the IDs of the entities (activities/pledges) which should be taken into this report (taking filtering into account) call it after having populated the columns with data
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getFilteringColumns()
      returns a set of columns which should be fetched-and-filtered; then, only the activityIds which have survived filtering in these columns should be kept in the rest of the report
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getMandatoryHiers()
      returns a list of hierarchies which should be mandatorily part of the report.
      java.util.Map<NiDimension.NiDimensionUsage,java.util.function.Predicate<NiDimension.Coordinate>> getProcessedFilters()
      returns the Predicate-filters to impose on all the cells which come out of fetchers IF they have the given NiDimension.NiDimensionUsage.
      protected boolean isFilteringColumn(java.lang.String colName)
      returns true IFF this column should be used for filtering entityIDs

        protected final java.util.Set<java.lang.String> mandatoryHiers
        the hierarchies which the generated report MUST have. They will be generated virtually and then removed in case the ReportSpec happens to not specify them

    • Constructor Detail

      • PassiveNiFilters

        public PassiveNiFilters(NiReportsEngine engine,
                        java.util.Map<NiDimension.NiDimensionUsage,java.util.function.Predicate<NiDimension.Coordinate>> filteringCoordinates,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.util.function.Predicate<Cell>>> cellPredicates,
                        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> filteringColumns,
                        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> mandatoryHiers,
                        java.util.function.Function<NiReportsEngine,java.util.Set<java.lang.Long>> activityIdsComputer,
                        java.util.Optional<java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.Long>> activityIdsPredicate)
        constructs this instance. All of the fields are passive and given at construction time, with the exception of workspaceFilter, which is an active computation.
        Parameters:
        activityIdsComputer - the function to generate the initial workspace filter
        activityIdsPredicate - the filtering predicate for the ids generated by activityIdsComputer

    • Method Detail

      • getProcessedFilters

        public java.util.Map<NiDimension.NiDimensionUsage,java.util.function.Predicate<NiDimension.Coordinate>> getProcessedFilters()
        Description copied from interface: NiFilters
        returns the Predicate-filters to impose on all the cells which come out of fetchers IF they have the given NiDimension.NiDimensionUsage. Cells which do not respond to a given NiDimension are unaffected by a given predicate
        Specified by:
        getProcessedFilters in interface NiFilters
        Returns:

      • getMandatoryHiers

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getMandatoryHiers()
        Description copied from interface: NiFilters
        returns a list of hierarchies which should be mandatorily part of the report. In case the ReportSpec does not mandate any of them, the hierarchy will be added artificially and then removed via collapsing
        Specified by:
        getMandatoryHiers in interface NiFilters
        Returns:
